basics.name: Nathan Williams
basics.summary: I am a biotechnology strategy professional, focused on helping technology- and science-driven organizations solve the most challenging problems in healthcare.

work.name: Health Advances
work.summary: Team leader for a leading life sciences strategy consulting firm. Worked on over 50 engagements across biopharma, health IT, and digital health, in multiple therapeutic areas. Example projects listed below.
highlights: Developed a portfolio strategy spanning neurology, psychiatry, pain, and for a clinical-stage biotech\â€™s discovery program targeting a specific potassium ion channel
Developed a ten-year corporate strategy for a medical device startup focused on home dialysis, which led to a major shift in their priorities for a next-generation device
Created a detailed business strategy for a large medical device company building a new line of business in remote patient monitoring, wearables, and population health
Commercial due diligence of an outsourced antibody discovery company using in vitro selection techniques on semi-synthetic antibody libraries to identify candidate antibodies

work.name: Harvard Stem Cell Institute
work.summary: Designed and executed independent project on macrocephaly in CHD8- and PTEN-associated autism, using CRISPR-modified human embryonic stem cell lines to create cerebral organoids.

work.name: Sanford Burnham Prebys Medical Discovery Institute
work.summary: Supported research on human choroid plexus tumors using qRT-PCR, immunohistochemistry, and confocal microscopy.

work.name: Mast Therapeutics
work.summary: Created 32,000 word orientation manual for new employees to understand sickle-cell disease, lead drug candidate (vepoloxamer), and competutive landscape.

courses: Introduction to Computer Science I and II

awards.title: Junior 24
awards.summary: One of 24 students in the class of 2019 inducted into PBK as a Junior

projects.name: Personal Website
projects.summary: A website for personal information, projects, writings, and photography.

projects.name: The Calvin and Hobbes Database
projects.summary: An indexed, searchable website of every Calvin and Hobbes strip ever written. Defunct since Heroku ended free hosting plans.
